## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Is your feature request related to a problem?

Example: "I'm always frustrated when [...]"

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions

Have you considered any alternative solutions or features? Please describe them.

## Use Case

Describe your use case and how this feature would benefit you or other users.

## Example

If applicable, provide an example of how this feature would be used:

```bash
gh0st [example command with new feature]
```

Or describe the expected behavior/output.

## Similar Features in Other Tools

Are there similar features in other tools that you can reference?

## Implementation Ideas

If you have any ideas about how this could be implemented, share them here (optional).

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this feature hasn't been requested
- [ ] I have clearly described the feature and its benefits
- [ ] I have provided examples or use cases
